Name: Run - Windows Installer
Description: Runs the Windows Installer to non-interactively install an MSI

Parameters.Name: MsiFilePath
Parameters.Label: Msi File Path
Parameters.HelpText: This is the path of the MSI file that will be installed. If the path includes wildcards, then the first match will be used.

Parameters.Name: Action
Parameters.Label: Action
Parameters.HelpText: The task to perform with the MSI, options include install, repair or remove.

Parameters.Name: Properties
Parameters.Label: Properties
Parameters.HelpText:
Properties that will be passed to the MSI separated by lines. Properties are in the format key=value, note that values with spaces in the must be quoted. 

    Key=Value
    Key="Value"

Parameters.Name: LoggingOptions
Parameters.Label: Logging Options
Parameters.HelpText:
One or more of:

    [i|w|e|a|r|u|c|m|o|p|v|x|+|!|*]

-  i - Status messages
-  w - Nonfatal warnings
-  e - All error messages
-  a - Start-up of actions
-  r - Action-specific records
-  u - User requests
-  c - Initial UI parameters
-  m - Out-of-memory or fatal exit information
-  o - Out-of-disk-space messages
-  p - Terminal properties
-  v - Verbose output
-  x - Extra debugging information
-  \+ - Append to existing log file
-  ! - Flush each line to the log
-  \* - Log all information, except for v and x options

Parameters.Name: LogAsArtifact
Parameters.Label: Log as artifact
Parameters.HelpText:
If selected, then return log output as an artifact.
If unselected then return log output as inline content
